DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study evaluate effect desvenlafaxine administer DVS SR pharmacokinetics midazolam healthy male female subject . The amount drug body effect drug also evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Effect Desvenlafaxine Pharmacokinetics Midazolam
DOC.criteria: Men nonpregnant , nonlactating woman , 18 55 year age inclusive screening . Healthy determine investigator basis medical history , physical examination , clinical laboratory test result , vital sign , 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) . Nonsmoker smoker few 10 cigarette per day determine history . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 Ilbs ) . Presence history significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , hematologic , neurologic , psychiatric disease . Presence history glaucoma intraocular pressure . Any surgical medical condition may interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion investigational product . Allergy midazolam , benzodiazepine , desvenlafaxine , venlafaxine . Acute disease state ( eg , nausea , vomit , fever , diarrhea ) 7 day study day 1 . Admitted alcohol abuse history alcohol use may interfere subject 's ability comply protocol requirement . History drug abuse within 1 year study day 1 .
